Class FullChunkLoaderThread

java.lang.Object
  org.jmc.FullChunkLoaderThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, ChunkLoaderThread
public class FullChunkLoaderThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChunkLoaderThread

Chunk loader that loads all the chunks for the chosen save.

danijel
